Literature.Title: Rule-based omics mining reveals antimicrobial macrocyclic peptides against drug-resistant clinical isolates
Literature.Author: Cheng Z, He BB, Lei K, Gao Y, Shi Y, Zhong Z, Liu H, Liu R, Zhang H, Wu S, Zhang W, Tang X, Li YX

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:IC50=25.9 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus DSM 1790(MIC=0.06µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis OG1RF(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MCC 2763(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 15(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 20(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700788(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700699(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51575(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>64µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=136.3µg/ml)
